1000010101101101 0111100111101101 0 -> sum: 1111111101011010, cout: 0

0110110101001100 0110100101011110 1 -> sum: 1101011010101011, cout: 0
0011011100100001 1100000010111011 0 -> sum: 1111011111011100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
